description: Server entry point for the Remix application handling server-side rendering and request handling, including bot detection and response streams.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler function that sets CORS headers and delegates the request based on user agent detection.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents, streaming the response back to the client.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering for browser user agents, streaming the React application shell.
